        public GameList()

    • Method Detail

      • addGame

        public void addGame(java.lang.String name,
                    int year,
                    java.lang.String console,
                    boolean inProgress,
                    boolean completed,
                    long mainLength,
                    long mainExtrasLength)
        Adds a game to the list.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the game to add to the list
        year - The year the game was released
        console - The platform the game is played on
        inProgress - True if the game is currently being played. False otherwise.
        completed - True if the game was finished by the user. False otherwise.
        mainLength - The amount of time it takes to beat the main game in seconds
        mainExtrasLength - The amount of time it takes to beat the main game + extras in seconds

      • deleteGame

        public void deleteGame(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes a game from the list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the game the user wants to delete.

      • editGame

        public void editGame(java.lang.String oldName,
                     java.lang.String newName,
                     int newYear,
                     java.lang.String newConsole,
                     boolean newInProgress,
                     boolean newCompleted,
                     long newMainLength,
                     long newMainExtrasLength)
        Edits game information of an entry in the list
        Parameters:
        oldName - The old name of the game in the list. Used to search its location.
        newName - The new name of the game after the edit.
        newYear - The new year of the game after the edit.
        newConsole - The new console of the game after the edit.
        newInProgress - The new in progress state after the edit
        newCompleted - The new completed state after the edit
        newMainLength - The new main length time of the game after the edit.
        newMainExtrasLength - The new main length + extras time of the game after the edit

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts the game list to a string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string with the information contained in the list for every game in the list

      • searchList

        public int searchList(java.lang.String name)
        Searches the list for game with a matching name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the game that is being searched for
        Returns:
        The index of the game in the list, or a -1 if the game was not found
